Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
ðŸš€ New Premium Features: Share, History, Floor Detection & Review Prompts

## Shareable Parking Location
- shareLocationService.ts: Create shareable links (24hr expiry)
- ShareLocationSheet.tsx: Beautiful bottom sheet with SMS, WhatsApp, Email options
- Native share sheet integration with fallback to clipboard

## Parking History with Search
- parkingHistoryService.ts: Full CRUD for parking history (500 entries)
- Search by address, notes, date range, tags
- Statistics: total parks, avg duration, top locations
- ParkingHistoryScreen.tsx: Browse/search history UI with filters

## Floor/Level Detection
- floorDetectionService.ts: Barometric pressure sensor integration
- Calibration system for parking garages
- Underground floor detection (B1, B2, etc)
- High/medium/low confidence readings

## App Review Prompts
- appReviewService.ts: Smart review timing
- Triggers after 3 successful navigations
- Respects 60-day cooldown between prompts
- Max 3 lifetime prompts
- Native StoreReview API integration
